trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Cartersville
There were no other sightings in Cartersville on or around June 30th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were out on porch having a cigarette, I was looking up in the sky and shouted to my husband did you see that he said no, I thought it might have been shooting star but it came out of nowhere and materalized out of nowhere went straight across for about 2 secs and disappeared. Then about 40 secs later another one appeared a little smaller or could be possible it was the same one, but it just materialized and was closer to us and then dissapeared again. He and I saw the second one at the same time. We lost sight cause it just disappeared.
